name: Bullet Filled Space
description:
A retro-style Shmup made in 48 hours for the Web Monetization Challenge. 

Blast your way past the unknown alien opposition with different weapon pick-ups. 

Kill enemy ships to restore HP.

 Use Of The Theme 

Secrets , as in mastery of the patience and technique required to play a bullet hell without rage quitting(though its not that hard).

Download the coil browser plugin for chrome & sign up to start with  free perks.

Some Weapons are only available to coil subscribers but that in no way makes the game unplayable for those not subscribed, playing conditions have been tested with all the weapons all through to the end. Happy Playing :)
